reviewText: I've not heard someone talk so much and say so little. I thought it was a bunch of bunk but thought so watch it through to the end. That is until I saw Uri Geller, a PROVEN fraud. That's when I had enough.

I am just getting interested in remote viewing and ordered this dvd.  Russell Targ is so brilliant and informative.  I think everyone who is interested in this subject should watch this dvd.  The man is a genius.  I am also reading 2 or 3 of his books.

This remarkable film describes the previously SECRET psychic spying program at Stanford Research Institute during the Cold War and also shows 30 min. of never before released footage of Uri Geller at SRI.
